Package ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.repositories.filesystem

Interface IridaFileStorageUtility

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IridaFileStorageAwsUtilityImpl, IridaFileStorageAzureUtilityImpl, IridaFileStorageLocalUtilityImpl
    public interface IridaFileStorageUtility
    Interface describing methods for performing storage actions

        Write file to storage (azure, aws, or local)
        Parameters:
        source - The Path to the file
        target - The Path to where file should be moved
        sequenceFileDir - The Path to sequence file directory
        sequenceFileDirWithRevision - The Path to sequence file revision directory
